name: hat of a cat
sizes_available: baby, toddler, child, adult small, adult medium, adult large.
notes:
this is an easy and fun hat to knit as a last minute gift. it uses dk and lace mohair yarns held together. the double thick brim makes it super warm and cosy.

sizes:
**baby**, toddler, **child**, small adult, **medium adult**, large adult

to fit head:
**35 - 40 cm**, 40 - 45 cm, **45 - 50cm**, 50 - 54 cm, **54 - 58cm**, 58 - 62  cm
**15” – 16.5”**, 16.5” – 18”, **18” – 19.5”**, 19.5” – 21”, **21” – 23”**, 23” – 24.5”
